@dackanuber Try this method. Found it in yahoo answer.

Answer by: Archer

@dackanuber Try this. Find fmodex.dll at dll-files. com. download, extract, copy and paste it in System32 folder.

c:/windows/system32/
If you're having dll problems, trying copying the crack to the Binary folder in the Main game folder instead.

This version is NOT COMPLETE.  Doesn't include any of the backdrop graphics.  no stars, no nebulae, no earth, no gas fields.  essentially it lacks and of the stuff that makes the screenshots look so nice.  NUKE this garbage until we get a real complete version.

I got it to work....but it involves installing the other version that was seeded here on the bay...the one by COGENT.  once both are installed, copy the "ART" folder from the pc > main directory in the COGENT version, and replace the one in the install directory for this version.  this rearranges some of the folders (though there are still the same number of files total) and enables the backgrounds and starscapes to work....makes ALL the difference in the world.  you're welcome!
Cost only 15 euro on steam.
